title: SVG favicons
body: Support for SVG icons in <link rel="icon" sizes="any">

comments.body: I'm a dev currently working on a project that runs on 25 urls. Every site has icons in 20 different formats. Which means I currently have 500 icons in a single folder. Please support SVG so I can end this madness, I'll buy you a beer!

On my SurfaceBook 2 almost no favicon even looks ok in Edge because my screen is so nice, but the favicons are fuzzy. Please add support for SVG favicons! If I want them to look sharp, I have to ***** open Chrome. That's kinda embarrassing.
This is now supported in both Opera and Firefox!
Microsoft Connect issue [Closed as Won't Fix] https://connect.microsoft.com/IE/feedback/details/782416/svg-favicon-support
SVG is the future and the right now also the reality... I don't want to redraw every piece of graphics if somebody invent some new resolution as 4k :D

> Please let this happen. SVG graphics are the future.
mnsth, SVG is the future, the present and the past but Microsoft is the present and the past, NOT the future.
Please let this happen. SVG graphics are the future.
